clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy of Sodium Heparin for Prophylaxis of Venous Thromboembolism in Surgical Patients
clinical_study.official_title: NON CLINICAL INFERIORITY OF HEPARIN SODIUM PRODUCED BY HIPOLABOR FARMACEUTICA LTDA COMPARED TO THE HEPARIN SODIUM PRODUCED BY APP PHARMACEUTICALS IN VENOUS THROMBOEMBOLISM PROPHYLAXIS, IN SURGICAL PATIENTS WITH MEDIUM RISK FOR DEVELOPMENT OF THROMBOEMBOLISM.

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to verify, through clinical examination and doppler, the non-inferiority of the drug test (heparin sodium 5.000UI/0.25 mL - HIPOLABOR) in relation to the drug compared (heparin sodium 5.000USP/mL - APP) in preventing the development of venous thromboembolism (VTE) in patients undergoing surgery for medium risk for the development of this pathology.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 2 h before the start of surgery, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 14, 21, 28 days
